author: Reuters Editorial
title: Atico Mining Says Unit Received Notice Of Claim From Administrative Tribunal Of Cundinamarca
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Atico Mining Corp:
* ATICO MINING - UNIT RECEIVED NOTICE OF CLAIM FROM ADMINISTRATIVE TRIBUNAL OF CUNDINAMARCA RELATED TO PAYMENT OF ROYALTIES ON PAST COPPER PRODUCTION
* ATICO MINING CORP - CLAIM THAT COMPANY HAS NOW RECEIVED FROM TRIBUNAL IN COLOMBIA IS IN AMOUNT OF APPROXIMATELY US$5 MILLION PLUS INTEREST AND FEES
* ATICO MINING CORP - HAS BEEN ADVISED BY ITS COLOMBIAN LEGAL COUNSEL THAT SUCH CLAIMS MAY TAKE UP TO 10 YEARS TO REACH A RESOLUTION Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
